title: ComplexityProfile
description: Complexity assessment profile for a software project, used to determine scaling of devplan output.

project_type_bucket.description: Classification of project type affecting base complexity

technical_complexity_bucket.description: Technical complexity classification based on requirements

team_size_bucket.description: Team size affecting coordination complexity multiplier

score.description: Calculated complexity score (0-20 typical range, higher with team multipliers)

estimated_phase_count.description: Recommended number of phases for the devplan

depth_level.description: Level of detail for generated artifacts

confidence.description: Confidence score for the complexity assessment (0.0-1.0)

rationale.description: Optional explanation of complexity assessment (from LLM-driven analysis)

hidden_complexity_flags.description: Optional flags for hidden complexity factors (compliance, security, etc.)

follow_up_questions.description: Optional follow-up questions if confidence is low
